amendatorysection.catchline: Personnel Division Revolving Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Personnel Division Revolving Fund is created. The fund shall be administered by the personnel division of the Department of Administrative Services. All funds received by the personnel division for employee recognition programs and advertising shall be credited to the fund. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act. Any money in the Employee Recognition Revolving Fund on July 1, 2000, shall be transferred to the Personnel Division Revolving Fund.
